data.title: How did North African countries become part of the Arab World while sub-Saharan African countries became part of the black world?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 3): Arab won; North Africans lost.

Whites won; Blacks lost.

The winner takes it all, writes the history books, controls the narrative, molds the reality, imposes the semantics and engages into cartographic violence and propaganda.

The Arab World is also known as Greater Arabia whe...
